articles.title: I'm a longevity doctor who has de-aged myself by decades. This is my essential bedtime routine if you want to - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dr Mark Hyman has had 63 birthdays, but tests show his biological age is that of a 43-year-old man. He says 'biohacking' doesn't need to be complicated - and his night-time routine is proof.
articles.content:
A longevity doctor has revealed his essential evening routine, which he claims helped reverse his biological clock.

articles.title: Niger coup leader declares himself country's new president - Financial Times
articles.description: Tchiani says he has taken over because of deteriorating security and economic hardship
articles.content:
The head of Nigers presidential guard has declared himself leader of the west African country after instigating the coup this week that deposed its pro-western leader.

articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: WhatsApp adding support for quick video messages - 9to5Google
articles.description: WhatsApp is preparing a new feature that enables quick video messages to be sent within a conversation, a feature Telegram has supported.
articles.content:
Like Telegram, Meta’s WhatsApp is now adding support for quick video messages that can be sent on the fly.
